analysis.key_quote: Schedule F threatens to erode that foundation. I urge the Administration and the Office of Personnel Management to reject any move to reinstate this classification and to uphold the integrity, independence, and professionalism of the federal workforce.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reinstatement of Schedule F, citing concerns about undermining merit-based civil service, due process rights, and the potential for politicization of the federal workforce.
